statements: SELECT * FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE humidity < 60
SELECT terrain_type FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData ORDER BY terrain_type DESC
SELECT object_count FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY object_count ASC
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE object_count > 100
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE terrain_type = 'forest' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT * FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE object_count > 1000 ORDER BY data_id
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE humidity < 0.5 AND terrain_type = 'mountain'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(object_count) AS avg_objects FROM VirtualWorldEnvironmentData WHERE terrain_type IN ('desert','grassland')
SELECT * FROM VirtualWorldData;
SELECT world_name, terrain_type FROM VirtualWorldData WHERE climate = 'Tropical';
SELECT world_id, population FROM VirtualWorldData ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM ARVRUsers WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT username, email FROM ARVRUsers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM VirtualWorldData WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY world_name DESC;
SELECT world_name, climate FROM VirtualWorldData WHERE terrain_type = 'mountain' ORDER BY world_id ASC;
SELECT population, world_name FROM VirtualWorldData WHERE climate = 'tropical' AND population < 50000;
SELECT * FROM ARVRUsers WHERE access_level = 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM ARVRUsers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentData
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM EnvironmentData ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT name, color FROM VirtualObjects WHERE size > 5.0
SELECT id, name, description FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0
SELECT id, name, description, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE name LIKE '%Park%'
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjects WHERE color = 'red';
SELECT id, name, color FROM VirtualObjects WHERE size > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, size FROM VirtualObjects JOIN Locations ON VirtualObjects.location_id = Locations.id WHERE Locations.name = 'Park' ORDER BY size ASC;

SELECT id, name, color, size FROM VirtualObjects JOIN Locations ON VirtualObjects.location_id = Locations.id JOIN EnvironmentData ON Locations.environment_id = EnvironmentData.id WHERE EnvironmentData.temperature > 25 ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjects WHERE id IN (SELECT location_id FROM VirtualObjects WHERE color = 'blue');
SELECT * FROM environment_data;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environment_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, object_name, object_type, location_id FROM virtual_objects ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT device_name, vendor, price FROM ar_vr_devices WHERE resolution = '4K' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, username, interests FROM user_profiles WHERE location='New York';
SELECT object_name, object_type FROM virtual_objects WHERE location_id=3 ORDER BY object_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, vendor, price FROM ar_vr_devices WHERE resolution='4K' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environment_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'example_user';
SELECT name, type FROM Objects WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM Interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assets WHERE type = 'image' AND size = 'small';
SELECT * FROM Environment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM Environment WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Objects WHERE type = 'Furniture' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT object_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM Interactions WHERE action = 'like' AND object_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
